column4: i have a problem with ubuntu :  when i check my new kernel it doesn't start, when i check my old kernel i get an alert:  /dev/disk/by-uuid/uuid  does not exists . When i try a live cd i get:  kernel panicnot syncing VFS unable to mount root fs on unknown block.

i have a problem with ubuntu :  when i check my new kernel it doesn't start, when i check my old kernel i get an alert:  /dev/disk/by-uuid/uuid  does not exists . When i try a live cd i get:  kernel panicnot syncing VFS unable to mount root fs on unknown block.
